data.title: Additive Free Alliance Members – The Additive Free Alliance
data.text:
In 2020 we launched what is now called the “Additive Free Alliance” for brands and distilleries that want to be super transparent about their production processes regarding the use of additives. It is an opt-in program, which needs to be renewed each year.

You can read more about our process, here.

This list will be updated each time a brand is added (or removed) from the program.
